channel.title: Getting a Server Started
channel.description:
Well, I am 14 years old, and my name is Fares. It's not a familiar name you got with everyday, it's like "Ferris Bueler" as many of you will notice from my past of [b]no posting[/b], I've been a member for a day. I am absolute that I will not be able to find what I want, or atleast a good enough reply that'll get me to understand it properly. The thing that isn't being replied in many forums, and the reply is that I would like someone with good sense of [b]knowledge[/b], to [b]explain[/b] to me, [b]exactly[/b] how, and where I could start my [b]own server[/b], and go right through to the [b]database[/b] so that I might be able to [b]change[/b]:
[ul][li]Commands[/li] [li]Item codes ([i]IF[/i] possible)[/li][/ul]
[b]Pictures of tabs such as:[/b] Quest tab, Skill tab, etcetra. So anyways, I really would like someone to post a good reply, and/or a thread that has already been made. I would like someone to actually try to somehow walk me through. I will reward that player if their technique/information was correct. Please don't post 3 word posts "Go forms bords!!!!!!" I had that happen alot considering most people think that they know everything.
I am a windows user. I got winRaR. I have JDK and I am willing to download anything, virus free.
I would like whoever replies to actually tell me the requirements for the server they're letting me download. I will add the person on msn if they'd like, and I want that person to actually feel comfortable around me, so we can share names, and the person could walk me through it. I know it's alot to ask for, but please. If you aren't up for the challenge/request I've given, please feel free to not post, I wouldn't mind that. It'll save people alot of time. Thank you for great forums, and a great client!

item.title: Getting a Server Started
item.dc:creator: @test1997 test1997
item.description:
@test1997 wrote:

If you meant this thread. Thank you so much, no need for MSN or anything, explained it all. Plus, I’d like to request someone locking this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting a Server Started
item.dc:creator: @dizzle11 dizzle11
item.description:
@dizzle11 wrote:

ok well i say to first leran things and get a feel for rsc you download the easyrsc source and check out yong min’s tut on how to edit what i need to know u can use the search option or even find those quite easy as they are on the first page of server development other then that if you have any other questions leave em here im sure someone will get to you best of luck

Read full topic

item.title: Getting a Server Started
item.dc:creator: @test1997 test1997
item.description:
@test1997 wrote:

Well, I am 14 years old, and my name is Fares. It’s not a familiar name you got with everyday, it’s like “Ferris Bueler” as many of you will notice from my past of no posting, I’ve been a member for a day. I am absolute that I will not be able to find what I want, or atleast a good enough reply that’ll get me to understand it properly. The thing that isn’t being replied in many forums, and the reply is that I would like someone with good sense of knowledge, to explain to me, exactly how, and where I could start my own server, and go right through to the database so that I might be able to change:

[ul][li]Commands[/li]
[li]Item codes (IF possible)[/li][/ul]

Pictures of tabs such as: Quest tab, Skill tab, etcetra. So anyways, I really would like someone to post a good reply, and/or a thread that has already been made. I would like someone to actually try to somehow walk me through. I will reward that player if their technique/information was correct. Please don’t post 3 word posts “Go forms bords!!!” I had that happen alot considering most people think that they know everything.

I am a windows user. I got winRaR. I have JDK and I am willing to download anything, virus free.

I would like whoever replies to actually tell me the requirements for the server they’re letting me download. I will add the person on msn if they’d like, and I want that person to actually feel comfortable around me, so we can share names, and the person could walk me through it. I know it’s alot to ask for, but please. If you aren’t up for the challenge/request I’ve given, please feel free to not post, I wouldn’t mind that. It’ll save people alot of time. Thank you for great forums, and a great client!

Read full topic
